2075590.name: PASSAGE
2075590.description:
PASSAGE is a challenging horror game about solving puzzles and surviving from the various beasts in the chamber. In this prison, quick thinking, knowledge and strategy are vital if you want to escape.

PUZZLES


There are 3 types of puzzles, with each one testing you in distinct ways. Do not get distracted and do not linger, as the stakes for solving these puzzles are high. Even the slightest mistake can, and will, kill you.

BEASTS


There are # distinct monsters in the chamber. The moment you step foot in it, they will be on the hunt. Knowledge, experience, skill and focus are required to evade each one. Get distracted even for a second, and they will catch you.


Only the worthy will pass. Are you ready to prove yourself?
2075590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
